meanings.definition: Not involving or related to hormones.
meanings.sent1: She preferred using nonhormonal skincare products.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a nonhormonal treatment for her condition.
meanings.sent3: The nonhormonal approach to gardening seemed to defy traditional methods.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to take the nonhormonal path in life led to unexpected opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The nonhormonal diet plan was easy to follow and produced great results.

meanings.sent1: His skin remained clear and nonhormonal even during stressful times.
meanings.sent2: The plant's growth was nonhormonal and steady throughout the year.
meanings.sent3: The nonhormonal clock ticked away, unaffected by the changing seasons.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a nonhormonal fortress, impervious to emotional fluctuations.
meanings.sent5: The nonhormonal response of the machine ensured its reliability under any conditions.

meanings.sent1: The nonhormonal supplement was safe for all users.
meanings.sent2: She chose the nonhormonal option to avoid any side effects.
meanings.sent3: The nonhormonal drink promised a natural and gentle boost of energy.
meanings.sent4: The nonhormonal formula of the product appealed to health-conscious consumers.
meanings.sent5: The nonhormonal shampoo was gentle on her hair and scalp.
